Title: The Codex of Holy Rituals
Text:
The Old Codex of Holy Rituals Chapter 2 Verse 17
2:17 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] And lo, from the storm, the mass heard the voice of Imperator.
2:18 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] And Imperator said, Come ye forth, to the east.
2:19 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] And Sentinel Imperator cast forth a light through the rain and the waves. The mass followed the light and sailed through the mist and the storm.
2:20 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] And the light, it came from the lighthouse upon the distant archipelago, where the warm currents meet, and where spices grow, and where golden fruit trees abound.
2:21 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] But from the mist behind them, dreadful Tacet Discords did pursue and tread upon the thunder, and the people cried out in wailing.
2:22 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] Then said Sentinel Imperator, I shall bring salvation.
2:23 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] And the Genesis Nexus cast forth a radiant light, and the Tacet Discords were swallowed up by the lighthouse. And when Sentinel Imperator called them forth once more, they became Divine Envoys.
2:24 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] And Sentinel Imperator said, wherever the Genesis Nexus shines, there shall the Divine Envoys dwell. The Genesis Nexus shall be my hand. I am the lighthouse of Rinascita, Sentinel Imperator.
2:25 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] For hundreds of years, the multitude hath followed Their precepts.
2:26 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] The Divine Envoys have shown their strength to uphold Their will.
2:27 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] To the followers, regard these as Imperator's blessing and spirit.
2:28 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] Love the Divine Envoys, as ye love your family, your brothers and sisters, and your neighbors.
2:29 [The Codex of Holy Rituals] We carry out the holy sacraments in memory of this.

The New Codex of Holy Rituals Chapter 5 Verse 2
5:03 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] They desired to deliver the Oracle, and so They inscribed the sacred words upon the oak tree, and from the Oracle, the first Viscum Berry did grow.
5:04 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] The berry is the essence of Imperator's wisdom. Partake of it, and your eyes shall be opened, that ye may discern between good and evil, and hearken unto its precepts.
5:05 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] Such is wisdom.
5:06 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] They turned the Dark Tide into a sea of clouds, and they cleansed the damaged Nuvola Fruit tree.
5:07 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] The healing resin is the sacred tears; it mends and restores. Breathe in the Mastic Nuvola, and the divinity within shall mend the frailty of humanity.
5:08 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] Such is divinity.
(The next two lines seem to have been smeared and are not legible.)
5:09 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] The third sacred meal ascended to the heavens with Them. Such is the transgression of the Fisalias.
5:10 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] They taught us to prick our fingers with ▇ ▇ ▇ and to mix the ▇ ▇ into the sacred wine. And so shall we be as brothers, and none shall be set apart.
5:11 [The New Codex of Holy Rituals] Such is the spirit.

The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 9
1:09 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] On that day, Napoli's brows and his hair were white like wool, as white as snow, and his eyes were as a flame of fire.
1:10 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] And They granted unto Napoli the lantern, like bronze glowing in a furnace, and the lantern echoed with the voices of the Divine Envoys.
1:11 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] Napoli lifted the lantern high in his return, like the sun shining in all its brilliance.
1:12 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] And the Tacet Discords of the Dark Tide bowed before him. He raised his right hand and spoke to the people: "Fear not. I am the Enlightened One of Sentinel Imperator. I am the first and the last, the beginning and the end. I can hear Their voice."
1:13 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] "I died, and behold I am alive forevermore, and I hold the keys to Heaven and Hell."
1:14 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] "Behold the light in my hand. The Lantern shall be the authority that connects us with Imperator."
1:15 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] Let who has ears hear:
1:16 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] And I heard, by the choirs and the trumpets beside Sentinel Imperator, a voice saying unto me, "Come up here, and I will show you what must take place after this."
1:17 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] At once I was in the spirit, and there before me was a throne on the sea. And a Divine Envoy stood forth and proclaimed, Who is worthy to take this lantern and let its light shine upon the world?
1:18 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] Then I wept greatly, for before the throne of Imperator stood the Divine Envoys, some appearing as though they had been slain, others covered with spikes. Then I heard Imperator say in a voice like thunder, "Come!"
1:19 [The Codex of Holy Rituals: Revelation] After this I looked, and behold, a white horse with only half a body. It commanded me to lift my lantern and pray, that people may come to know one another and be granted victory upon victory.
